actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize contributions to international financial institutions to help build the resilience of member countries, and for other purposes.
short_title: International Financial Institutions Mobilization Act of 2022

summary.text:
International Financial Institutions Mobilization Act of 2022

This bill authorizes support for international financial institutions, including by authorizing contributions and loans to the Poverty Reduction and Growth Trust or the Resilience and Sustainability Trust of the International Monetary Fund.

titles.title: International Financial Institutions Mobilization Act of 2022
International Financial Institutions Mobilization Act of 2022
A bill to authorize contributions to international financial institutions to help build the resilience of member countries, and for other purposes.
